product.title: 5-Inch Sanding Discs, 8-Hole Hook & Loop (50-Pack) – 80/120/180/220/320 Grit – Film-Backed Calcined Alumina (Aluminum Oxide) for Random Orbital/DA Sanders, Wood Metal Auto Body
product.description: 50-pack assorted sanding discs (80–320 grit) for wood, metal, fiberglass, and auto work. Film-backed calcined alumina cuts fast and stays cool. Flexible, tear-resistant film maintains even finish. Hook-and-loop backing allows quick changes; 8-hole pattern improves dust extraction.
